name: Cursedface Belongs Here (BETA)
description:
You tried to find a job but you got scammed. How? Somebody trapped you into a random room You have to stay here until 6 AM, becuase the cursedfaces would sleep and you'll be free to go! If you survived, You can go back to  your home, and they'll mostly forget about you. Controls:
  • A/Left = Look at the left
  • D/Right = Look at the middle/right
  • Click holes with mouse = block/unblock it (if it's red, it's blocked)
  • Hover at some objects with mouse = tells what is that object
  • Esc = Go back to the main menu (you can lose your game progress!)

That's the end ig
